Package itec220.labs

Class Board

java.lang.Object
itec220.labs.Board
public class Board extends Object
Board class to handle almost all logic for the game other than game state
Author:
Donovan Horne

    • move

      public boolean move(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY, Color currColor)
      Used to move a piece if the move is valid, as well as check for special cases such as en passant, castling, and promotions
      Parameters:
      startX - the starting row of the piece being moved
      startY - the starting column of the piece being moved
      endX - the destination row of the piece being moved
      endY - the destination column of the piece being moved
      currColor - a check to ensure the color of the piece is the correct with the one they want to move
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean, true if the move was made, false if it was an invalid move

    • getNumOfTakenPieces

      public int getNumOfTakenPieces()
      Return the number of pieces that have been taken
      Returns:
      Return an int value of the number of taken pieces

    • promote

      public void promote(int rank, int file, PieceType type)
      Used to promote a pawn to a new type of piece
      Parameters:
      rank - the row in which the pawn is in
      file - the column the pawn is in
      type - the type of piece the pawn wants to promote to

    • updateEnPassant

      public void updateEnPassant()
      Update enPassant variable after each move, if a piece is available for being enPassant remove it and set it to null, and set that it cannot be taken via en passant

    • canKingMove

      public boolean canKingMove(Color colorOfKing)
      a method to determine if the king can move, whether it be check or there are simply no possible moves for the king
      Parameters:
      colorOfKing - the color of the king that you wish to determine
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean about whether the king has any possible moves

    • calcPieceMoves

      public void calcPieceMoves(boolean kingFlag, Color color)
      Used to update all possible moves on the board for a specific color
      Parameters:
      kingFlag - if you want to check if the king is going to be in check or to ignore
      color - the color of pieces you wish to calculate all the moves for
